title: XTR Human - Interior
description: XTR Human are back with a new post punk/shoegaze/dreampop album.
release: Interior was released on Blackjack Illuminist Records on May 29, 2020.

title: Tame Impala "Borderline" - oder: das Kunstwerk im Zeitalter seiner ständigen Veränderbarkeit
description: Tame lmpala, die gelungene Neohippie-One-Man-Show-Band des Australiers Kevin Parker hat Anfang des Jahres ihr lang erwartetes viertes Studioalbum „The Slow Rush“ veröffentlicht. Es strahlt ein gleichermaßen melancholisches wie sonnendurchflutetes 70er Jahre Flair aus und ist von Yacht-Rock und elektrischen Supertramp-Pianos inspiriert. Es klingt nach einem besseren und stilvolleren L.A. vergangener Tage, das es so vermutlich nie gegeben hat ...

title: Sonic Boom - All Things Being Equal
description: Pete Kember's new album sounds like a mix of Kraftwerk and Animal Collective. it is the first Sonic Boom album after Spectrum, which was released in 1989. in the meantime, the former Spacemen 3 member produced and collaborated with bands like MGMT, Beach House or Panda Bear and released music as Spectrum or E.A.R. (Experimental Audio Research).
release: All Things Being Equal was released on Carpark Records on June 6, 2020.

title: Owen Pallett - Island
description: Owen Pallett surprises with Island, his first studio album in 6 years. Island was recorded live at Abbey Road Studios with the London Contemporary Orchestra.
release: Island was released on Domino on May 22, 2020.

title: Nation of Language - Introduction, Presence
description: Brooklyn based new wave trio Nation of Language self-released their debut Introduction, Presence.

title: Christian Lee Hutson - Beginners
description: LA based singer songwriter Christian Lee Hutson released his new album Beginners. it contains ten honest and intimate tracks. it was produced by Phoebe Bridgers (Boygenius and Better Oblivion Community Center).
release: Beginners was released on ANTI records on May 29, 2020.

title: Deerhoof - Future Teenage Cave Artists
description: Deerhoof released their 16th studio album. it is as usual unusual.
release: Future Teenage Cave Artists was released through Joyful Noise Recordings on May 29, 2020.

title: Cigarettes After Sex - You're All I Want
description: Cigarettes After Sex have surprise-dropped a new single You're All I Want. it was recorded during the sessions for their album cry and is hopefully part of a new album coming soon.
release: You're All I Want was released on Partisan Records on May 26, 2020.

title: Woods - Strange To Explain
description: The Brooklyn based folk rock band Woods released their 11th studio album. It is less lo-fi than the previews ones.
release: Strange To Explain was released on singer and guitarist Jeremy Earl's label Woodsist on May 22, 2020.

title: Spirit Fest - Mirage Mirage
description: Spirit Fest are Saya and Takashi Ueno (Tenniscoats), Markus Acher (The Notwist, Rayon), Cico Beck (Aloa Input, The Notwist) and Mat Fowler (Jam Money, Bons). their third album Mirage Mirage contains 14 beautiful tracks.
release: Mirage Mirage was released on Morr Music on May 15, 2020.

title: Perfume Genius - Set My Heart On Fire Immediately
description: Set My Heart on Fire Immediately is the fifths album of Mike Hadreas. its 13 tracks are quite diverse, lyrics are honest and poetic.
release: Set My Heart On Fire Immediately was released on Matador Records on May 15, 2020.

title: I Break Horses - Warnings
description: I Break Horses released after 6 years, a crashed hard drive and failed collaborations a new album. Fredrik Balck joined songwriter Maria Lindén on drums.
release: Warnings was released on Bella Union on May 8, 2020.

title: Midwife - Forever
description: already a month old, but still worth sharing. Denver musician Madeline Johnston released her second album, she calls her music heaven metal.
release: Forever was released through The Flenser on April 10, 2020.

title: Mark Lanegan - Straight Songs Of Sorrow
description: The former Screaming Trees frontman. Queens of the Stone Age collaborator and friend of Kurt Cobain released his 12th solo album, Straight Songs Of Sorrow. his book Sing Backwards and Weep was released last week. he has clearly seen and experienced some shit in his life.
release: Straight Songs Of Sorrow was released through Heavenly Recordings on May 8, 2020.

title: Field Works - Ultrasonic
description: Stuart Hyatt, echolocations of bats, nature and many contributors.
release: Ultrasonic was released on Temporary Residence on May 1, 2020.

title: Ride, Pêtr Aleksänder - Clouds In The Mirror
description: London-based duo Pêtr Aleksänder (Tom Hobden, Noah & The Whale and Eliot James, Two Door Cinema Club) transformed Ride's album This Is Not A Safe Place into a new athmospheric piece.
release: Clouds In The Mirrow was released on Wichita Recordings on May 1, 2020.

title: Shards & Isolation Choir - Inside I'll Sing
description: London-based experimental vocal ensemble Shards teamed up with a couple of musicians and released Inside I'll Sing. their Isolation Choir consists of Douglas Dare, Joe Newman (Alt-J), Jonathan Donahue (Mercury Rev), Anna Meredith, New York-based composer Nico Muhly, Luke Howard, Hatis Noit and many more. proceeds will be donated.
release: Inside I'll Sing was released on Erased Tapes on April 17, 2020.

title: Other Lives - For Their Love
description: having experimented with electronic textues on their last album (Rituals, 2015), Other Lives went back to an analog setup for the new album. it was recorded in songwriter Jesse Tabish' new house somewhere in the rural Cooper Mountain region of Oregon.
release: For Their Love was released on ATO Records on April 24, 2020.

title: Die Wilde Jagd - Haut
description: 4 songs, 45 minutes.
release: Haut was released on Bureau B on April 17, 2020.

title: Slut - For The Soul There Is No Hospital
description: after seven silent years, Slut just released their new single For The Soul There Is No Hospital.

title: Chromatics - Teacher
description: Chromatics have released their new song Teacher and the tracklist for their upcoming album Dear Tommy. a few weeks ago they already released Faded Now, a suprise album which includes a few remixes of songs from Closer To Grey and a couple of new ones.
release: Teacher was released through Italians Do It Better on April 17, 2020.

title: Soap&Skin - What's up?
description: And another very beautiful cover by Anja Plaschg, aka Soap&Skin. she and her sister Evelyn just published a new interpretation of the 90s classic What's up by the 4 Non Blondes. and I pray, oh my god do I pray, I pray every single day, for a revolution.

title: Porridge Radio - Every Bad
description: "grantig", repetitive and from Brighton.
release: Every Bad was released on Secretly Canadian on March 13th, 2020.

title: M. Ward - Migration Stories
description: Migration Stories is M. Ward's (She & Him, Monsters of Folk) tenth studio release and was recorded at Arcarde Fire's Montreal studio.
release: it is his debut for ANTI records and was realeased on April 4, 2020.

title: Social Isolation
description: Created and compiled during the last week of March 2020, this compilation brings together the sound of artists in isolation creating music that's reflective of our collective struggle during the Covid-19 pandemic. Those featured in this edition are of Indian origin [src].

title: Daniel Avery, Alessandro Cortini - Illusion of Time
description: yet another dreamy and atmospheric new album. Daniel Avery and Alessandro Cortini (Nine Inch Nails) joined forces and remotely made an album full of distorted drones, warm synth pads, feedback loops and other weird noises.
release: Illusion of Time was released through Phantasy Sounds on March 27, 2020.

title: Pantha Du Prince - Conference of Trees
description: already a month ago, the German musician Hendrik Weber aka Pantha Du Prince released the new album Conference of Trees. it has been performed at several theatre gigs last year already. what does it sound like when trees communicate?
release: Conference of Threes was released through BMG's Modern Recordings on March 6, 2020.

title: Nine Inch Nails - Ghosts V-VI
description: Nine Inch Nails released volumes five and six of their Ghosts series, subtitled Together and Locusts respectively. these two new releases are available for free on their website.
release: Ghosts V and VI were released on their label The Null Corporation on March 26, 2020.

title: Muzz - Broken Tambourine
description: Muzz was formed by Paul Banks (Interpol), Matt Barrick (the Walkmen, Fleet Foxes) and Josh Kaufman (Bonny Light Horseman, Day of the Dead). after dropping their first track Bad Feeling on SoundCloud earlier this month, the band now officially released their first single.
release: Broken Tambourine was released on Matador Records on March 24, 2020.

title: Nils Frahm - Empty
description: the eight-track lp was originally written as the soundtrack to a short film he shot with his friend Benoit Toulemonde.
release: Empty was released on Erased Types on piano day, March 28, 2020.

title: Sufjan Stevens and Lowell Brams - Aporia
description: Aporia is the new album of Sufjan Stevens and his stepfather Lowell Brams. it contains 21 ambient, instrumental tracks.
release: it was released through their label Asthmatic Kitty on March 24, 2020.
